lead_paragraph: Tottenham Hotspur midfielder Dele Alli is facing a three-match ban after he was charged with violent conduct having appeared to punch West Bromwich Albion's Claudio Yacob in Monday's Premier League game.

headline.print_headline: Spurs' Dele Alli Facing Ban After Violent Conduct Charge
headline.main: Spurs' Dele Alli Facing Ban After Violent Conduct Charge

snippet: Tottenham Hotspur midfielder Dele Alli is facing a three-match ban after he was charged with violent conduct having appeared to punch West Bromwich Albion's Claudio Yacob in Monday's Premier League game....
